entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 3:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10 except 6 along the coast.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
